channel.title: Conversion help

item.title: Conversion help
item.dc:creator: @collin123456 collin123456
item.description:
@collin123456 wrote:

could somebody convert this:

public static void assassin(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) { Class9 intassassin = AddTab(25); intassassin.anIntArray240 = new int[27]; intassassin.anIntArray241 = new int[27]; intassassin.anIntArray272 = new int[27]; //Main interface intassassin.anIntArray240[0] = 26; intassassin.anIntArray241[0] = 4; intassassin.anIntArray272[0] = 16; //No main interface image. //Control 1 of main interface (Image) intassassin.anIntArray240[1] = 27; intassassin.anIntArray241[1] = 4; intassassin.anIntArray272[1] = 16; AddInterfaceImage(27, "assassin", "back 2.png"); //Control 2 of main interface (ClickableLabel) intassassin.anIntArray240[2] = 28; intassassin.anIntArray241[2] = 184; intassassin.anIntArray272[2] = 25; AddClickableText(28, "Special Assassin Shop", "Label", wid, 1, 0xFFD700, 136, 20); //Control 3 of main interface (Image) intassassin.anIntArray240[3] = 29; intassassin.anIntArray241[3] = 45; intassassin.anIntArray272[3] = 68; AddInterfaceImage(29, "assassin", "Coins.png"); //Control 4 of main interface (TextButton) intassassin.anIntArray240[4] = 30; intassassin.anIntArray241[4] = 22; intassassin.anIntArray272[4] = 111; //Control 5B of main interface (TextButton) intassassin.anIntArray240[5] = 31; intassassin.anIntArray241[5] = 47; intassassin.anIntArray272[5] = 121; AddInterfaceLabel(31, "Coins", wid, 1, 0xFFA500); AddInterfaceButton(30, 90, 41, "TextButton", "assassin", "DefaultButton.png"); //Control 6 of main interface (Image) intassassin.anIntArray240[6] = 32; intassassin.anIntArray241[6] = 45; intassassin.anIntArray272[6] = 192; AddInterfaceImage(32, "assassin", "key.png"); //Control 7 of main interface (TextButton) intassassin.anIntArray240[7] = 33; intassassin.anIntArray241[7] = 22; intassassin.anIntArray272[7] = 242; //Control 8B of main interface (TextButton) intassassin.anIntArray240[8] = 34; intassassin.anIntArray241[8] = 47; intassassin.anIntArray272[8] = 252; AddInterfaceLabel(34, "Keys", wid, 1, 0xFFA500); AddInterfaceButton(33, 90, 41, "TextButton", "assassin", "DefaultButton.png"); //Control 9 of main interface (Image) intassassin.anIntArray240[9] = 35; intassassin.anIntArray241[9] = 158; intassassin.anIntArray272[9] = 61; AddInterfaceImage(35, "assassin", "tickets.png"); //Control 10 of main interface (TextButton) intassassin.anIntArray240[10] = 36; intassassin.anIntArray241[10] = 134; intassassin.anIntArray272[10] = 111; //Control 11B of main interface (TextButton) intassassin.anIntArray240[11] = 37; intassassin.anIntArray241[11] = 157; intassassin.anIntArray272[11] = 121; AddInterfaceLabel(37, "Tickets", wid, 1, 0xFFA500); AddInterfaceButton(36, 90, 41, "TextButton", "assassin", "DefaultButton.png"); //Control 12 of main interface (Image) intassassin.anIntArray240[12] = 38; intassassin.anIntArray241[12] = 151; intassassin.anIntArray272[12] = 192; AddInterfaceImage(38, "assassin", "XP.png"); //Control 13 of main interface (TextButton) intassassin.anIntArray240[13] = 39; intassassin.anIntArray241[13] = 134; intassassin.anIntArray272[13] = 242; //Control 14B of main interface (TextButton) intassassin.anIntArray240[14] = 40; intassassin.anIntArray241[14] = 169; intassassin.anIntArray272[14] = 252; AddInterfaceLabel(40, "XP", wid, 1, 0xFFA500); AddInterfaceButton(39, 90, 41, "TextButton", "assassin", "DefaultButton.png"); //Control 15 of main interface (TextButton) intassassin.anIntArray240[15] = 41; intassassin.anIntArray241[15] = 259; intassassin.anIntArray272[15] = 111; //Control 16B of main interface (TextButton) intassassin.anIntArray240[16] = 42; intassassin.anIntArray241[16] = 280; intassassin.anIntArray272[16] = 122; AddInterfaceLabel(42, "Potion 1", wid, 1, 0xFFA500); AddInterfaceButton(41, 90, 41, "TextButton", "assassin", "DefaultButton.png"); //Control 17 of main interface (Image) intassassin.anIntArray240[17] = 43; intassassin.anIntArray241[17] = 290; intassassin.anIntArray272[17] = 61; AddInterfaceImage(43, "assassin", "red.png"); //Control 18 of main interface (TextButton) intassassin.anIntArray240[18] = 44; intassassin.anIntArray241[18] = 372; intassassin.anIntArray272[18] = 111; AddInterfaceButton(49, 90, 41, "TextButton", "assassin", "DefaultButton.png"); //Control 25 of main interface (Image) intassassin.anIntArray240[25] = 51; intassassin.anIntArray241[25] = 290; intassassin.anIntArray272[25] = 192; AddInterfaceImage(51, "assassin", "blue.png"); //Control 26 of main interface (Image) intassassin.anIntArray240[26] = 52; intassassin.anIntArray241[26] = 403; intassassin.anIntArray272[26] = 192; AddInterfaceImage(52, "assassin", "green.png"); }

to like this:

[code]public static void choosespell(RSFont[] TDA) {
RSInterface Interface = addInterface(16000);
Interface.children = new int[6];
Interface.childX = new int[6];
Interface.childY = new int[6];
//Main interface
Interface.children[0] = 16001;
Interface.childX[0] = 4;
Interface.childY[0] = 16;
//No main interface image.
//Control 1 of main interface (Image)
Interface.children[1] = 16002;
Interface.childX[1] = 69;
Interface.childY[1] = 71;
addSprite(16002, 0, “Interfaces/Choosespell/Sprite”);
//Control 2 of main interface (Button)
Interface.children[2] = 16003;
Interface.childX[2] = 218;
Interface.childY[2] = 137;
AddInterfaceButton(16003, 1, “Interfaces/Choosespell/MAGIC”, “Ancient Spells”);
//Control 3 of main interface (Button)
Interface.children[3] = 16004;
Interface.childX[3] = 107;
Interface.childY[3] = 137;
AddInterfaceButton(16004, 0, “Interfaces/Choosespell/MAGIC”, “Normal Spells”);
//Control 4 of main interface (Button)
Interface.children[4] = 16005;
Interface.childX[4] = 339;
Interface.childY[4] = 137;
AddInterfaceButton(16005, 2, “Interfaces/Choosespell/MAGIC”, “Lunar Spells”);
//Control 5 of main interface (Label)
Interface.children[5] = 16006;
Interface.childX[5] = 147;
Interface.childY[5] = 78;
addText(16006, "Select the magic you would like to cast. ", TDA, 1, 0xFFA500);
}

private static void addHead2(int i, int j, int k, int l)
{

RSInterface rsinterface = addTab(i);

rsinterface.interfaceType = 6;

rsinterface.modelZoom = l;

rsinterface.modelRotationY = 40;

rsinterface.modelRotationX = 1900;

rsinterface.height = k;

rsinterface.width = j;

}
[/code]
